result.eng: Could you warm me a cup of milk?
result.ga: an bhféadfá cupán bainne a théamh dom
result.orig: an bhféadfá cupán bainne a théamh dom
result.html: an bhféadfá cupán bainne a théamh domCould you warm me a cup of milk?
result.ponchtml: an ḃféadfá cupán bainne a ṫéaṁ domCould you warm me a cup of milk?

result.eng: Could you wash the dishes?
result.ga: an dtiocfadh leat na soithí a ní
result.orig: an dtiocfadh leat na soithí a ní
result.html: an dtiocfadh leat na soithí a níCould you wash the dishes?
result.ponchtml: an dtiocfaḋ leat na soiṫí a níCould you wash the dishes?

result.eng: Could you call Bríd?
result.ga: an dtiocfadh leat glaoch a chur ar bhríd
result.orig: an dtiocfadh leat glaoch a chur ar bhríd
result.html: an dtiocfadh leat glaoch a chur ar bhrídCould you call Bríd?
result.ponchtml: an dtiocfaḋ leat glaoċ a ċur ar ḃrídCould you call Bríd?

result.eng: I was ill, so I could not go to school.
result.ga: bhí mé tinn mar sin níorbh fhéidir liom dul ar scoil
result.orig: bhí mé tinn mar sin níorbh fhéidir liom dul ar scoil
result.html: bhí mé tinn mar sin níorbh fhéidir liom dul ar scoilI was ill, so I could not go to school.
result.ponchtml: ḃí mé tinn mar sin níorḃ ḟéidir liom dul ar scoilI was ill, so I could not go to school.

result.eng: The plan could be finished in six years.
result.ga: d'fhéadfadh an beart a bheith críochnaithe faoi cheann sé bliana
result.orig: d'fhéadfadh an beart a bheith críochnaithe faoi cheann sé bliana
result.html: d'fhéadfadh an beart a bheith críochnaithe faoi cheann sé blianaThe plan could be finished in six years.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟéadfaḋ an beart a ḃeiṫ críoċnaiṫe faoi ċeann sé blianaThe plan could be finished in six years.

result.eng: She could be anywhere!
result.ga: d'fhéadfadh sí bheith áit ar bith
result.orig: d'fhéadfadh sí bheith áit ar bith
result.html: d'fhéadfadh sí bheith áit ar bithShe could be anywhere!
result.ponchtml: d'ḟéadfaḋ sí ḃeiṫ áit ar biṫShe could be anywhere!

result.eng: I could work hard.
result.ga: d'fhéadfainn obair go crua
result.orig: d'fhéadfainn obair go crua
result.html: d'fhéadfainn obair go cruaI could work hard.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟéadfainn obair go cruaI could work hard.

result.eng: However bad things are today, they could be worse tomorrow.
result.ga: dá dhonacht rudaí inniu d'fhéadfaidís bheith níos measa amárach
result.orig: dá dhonacht rudaí inniu d'fhéadfaidís bheith níos measa amárach
result.html: dá dhonacht rudaí inniu d'fhéadfaidís bheith níos measa amárachHowever bad things are today, they could be worse tomorrow.
result.ponchtml: dá ḋonaċt rudaí inniu d'ḟéadfaidís ḃeiṫ níos measa amáraċHowever bad things are today, they could be worse tomorrow.

result.eng: Could you speak louder, please. The line is breaking up.
result.ga: an bhféadfá labhairt níos airde le do thoil tá an líne ag briseadh
result.orig: an bhféadfá labhairt níos airde le do thoil tá an líne ag briseadh
result.html: an bhféadfá labhairt níos airde le do thoil tá an líne ag briseadhCould you speak louder, please. The line is breaking up.
result.ponchtml: an ḃféadfá laḃairt níos airde le do ṫoil tá an líne ag briseaḋCould you speak louder, please. The line is breaking up.

result.eng: Could you spell that?
result.ga: an bhféadfá é sin a litriú
result.orig: an bhféadfá é sin a litriú
result.html: an bhféadfá é sin a litriúCould you spell that?
result.ponchtml: an ḃféadfá é sin a litriúCould you spell that?

result.eng: Could you wait a minute?
result.ga: an bhféadfá fanacht nóiméad
result.orig: an bhféadfá fanacht nóiméad
result.html: an bhféadfá fanacht nóiméadCould you wait a minute?
result.ponchtml: an ḃféadfá fanaċt nóiméadCould you wait a minute?

result.eng: You're interested in football, right? You could say I am!
result.ga: tá spéis agat sa bpeil an bhfuil d'fhéadfá a rá go bhfuil
result.orig: tá spéis agat sa bpeil an bhfuil d'fhéadfá a rá go bhfuil
result.html: tá spéis agat sa bpeil an bhfuil d'fhéadfá a rá go bhfuilYou're interested in football, right? You could say I am!
result.ponchtml: tá spéis agat sa bpeil an ḃfuil d'ḟéadfá a rá go ḃfuilYou're interested in football, right? You could say I am!

result.eng: I drank as much of the water as I could.
result.ga: d'ól mé a bhféadfainn den uisce
result.orig: d'ól mé a bhféadfainn den uisce
result.html: d'ól mé a bhféadfainn den uisceI drank as much of the water as I could.
result.ponchtml: d'ól mé a ḃféadfainn den uisceI drank as much of the water as I could.

result.eng: I knew well that if I could reach Europe, I would have succeeded.
result.ga: thuig mé féin dá bhféadfainn an eoraip a bhaint amach go mbeadh liom
result.orig: thuig mé féin dá bhféadfainn an eoraip a bhaint amach go mbeadh liom
result.html: thuig mé féin dá bhféadfainn an eoraip a bhaint amach go mbeadh liomI knew well that if I could reach Europe, I would have succeeded.
result.ponchtml: ṫuig mé féin dá ḃféadfainn an eoraip a ḃaint amaċ go mbeaḋ liomI knew well that if I could reach Europe, I would have succeeded.

result.eng: The pot was so large you could make porridge for a house full of poor people in it.
result.ga: bhí an pota chomh mór sin go bhféadfá brachán do theach lán bochtán a dhéanamh ann
result.orig: bhí an pota chomh mór sin go bhféadfá brachán do theach lán bochtán a dhéanamh ann
result.html: bhí an pota chomh mór sin go bhféadfá brachán do theach lán bochtán a dhéanamh annThe pot was so large you could make porridge for a house full of poor people in it.
result.ponchtml: ḃí an pota ċoṁ mór sin go ḃféadfá braċán do ṫeaċ lán boċtán a ḋéanaṁ annThe pot was so large you could make porridge for a house full of poor people in it.

result.eng: He was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.
result.ga: bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bith
result.orig: bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bith
result.html: bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bithHe was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.
result.ponchtml: ḃí sé ag breaṫnú ar an doras aṁail is go ḃféadfaḋ an t-áiḃirseoir féin teaċt isteaċ nóiméad ar biṫHe was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.

result.eng: All you could see on the building was a big hole in its side.
result.ga: ní raibh le feiceáil ar an túr ach poll mór ina thaobh
result.orig: ní raibh le feiceáil ar an túr ach poll mór ina thaobh
result.html: ní raibh le feiceáil ar an túr ach poll mór ina thaobhAll you could see on the building was a big hole in its side.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ le feiceáil ar an túr aċ poll mór ina ṫaoḃAll you could see on the building was a big hole in its side.

result.eng: An airplane couldn't go all the way through the building, could it?
result.ga: ní fhéadfadh eitleán dul an bealach ar fad tríd an bhfoirgneamh an bhféadfadh
result.orig: ní fhéadfadh eitleán dul an bealach ar fad tríd an bhfoirgneamh an bhféadfadh
result.html: ní fhéadfadh eitleán dul an bealach ar fad tríd an bhfoirgneamh an bhféadfadhAn airplane couldn't go all the way through the building, could it?
result.ponchtml: ní ḟéadfaḋ eitleán dul an bealaċ ar fad tríd an ḃfoirgneaṁ an ḃféadfaḋAn airplane couldn't go all the way through the building, could it?

result.eng: But from time to time you could find in them [ie. in blogs] a sharp opinionated treasure or a shrewd review.
result.ga: Ó am go chéile áfach bhíodh seoid ghrinn tuairimíochta nó léirmheas géarchúiseach le fáil iontu
result.orig: Ó am go chéile áfach bhíodh seoid ghrinn tuairimíochta nó léirmheas géarchúiseach le fáil iontu
result.html: Ó am go chéile áfach bhíodh seoid ghrinn tuairimíochta nó léirmheas géarchúiseach le fáil iontuBut from time to time you could find in them [ie. in blogs] a sharp opinionated treasure or a shrewd review.
result.ponchtml: Ó am go ċéile áfaċ ḃíoḋ seoid ġrinn tuairimíoċta nó léirṁeas géarċúiseaċ le fáil iontuBut from time to time you could find in them [ie. in blogs] a sharp opinionated treasure or a shrewd review.

result.eng: All you could hear the bloggers about... was deadly silence.
result.ga: ciúnas na reilige a bhí le cluinstean ó na blagadóirí faoi
result.orig: ciúnas na reilige a bhí le cluinstean ó na blagadóirí faoi
result.html: ciúnas na reilige a bhí le cluinstean ó na blagadóirí faoiAll you could hear the bloggers about... was deadly silence.
result.ponchtml: ciúnas na reilige a ḃí le cluinstean ó na blagadóirí faoiAll you could hear the bloggers about... was deadly silence.

result.eng: You could of course claim that...
result.ga: thiocfadh leat a mhaíomh ar ndóigh go
result.orig: thiocfadh leat a mhaíomh ar ndóigh go
result.html: thiocfadh leat a mhaíomh ar ndóigh goYou could of course claim that...
result.ponchtml: ṫiocfaḋ leat a ṁaíoṁ ar ndóiġ goYou could of course claim that...

result.eng: They decorated everything as neatly as they could.
result.ga: feistíodh 'ach aon rud chomh deismir agus a féadadh
result.orig: feistíodh 'ach aon rud chomh deismir agus a féadadh
result.html: feistíodh 'ach aon rud chomh deismir agus a féadadhThey decorated everything as neatly as they could.
result.ponchtml: feistíoḋ 'aċ aon rud ċoṁ deismir agus a féadaḋThey decorated everything as neatly as they could.

result.eng: You could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.
result.ga: bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leis
result.orig: bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leis
result.html: bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leisYou could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.
result.ponchtml: ḃí sé ċoṁ maiṫ a ḃeiṫ ag caint leis an ġealaċ le a ḃeiṫ ag caint leisYou could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.

result.eng: He could not be satisfied. There was no satisfying him.
result.ga: ní raibh sásamh le déanamh air
result.orig: ní raibh sásamh le déanamh air
result.html: ní raibh sásamh le déanamh airHe could not be satisfied. There was no satisfying him.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ sásaṁ le déanaṁ airHe could not be satisfied. There was no satisfying him.

result.eng: You could have gotten rid of him a little more kindly than you did.
result.ga: thiocfadh leat a chur díot rud beag ní ba síodúla ná mar a rinne tú
result.orig: thiocfadh leat a chur díot rud beag ní ba síodúla ná mar a rinne tú
result.html: thiocfadh leat a chur díot rud beag ní ba síodúla ná mar a rinne túYou could have gotten rid of him a little more kindly than you did.
result.ponchtml: ṫiocfaḋ leat a ċur díot rud beag ní ba síodúla ná mar a rinne túYou could have gotten rid of him a little more kindly than you did.

result.eng: She could have laughed and that would be it.
result.ga: thiocfadh léi gáire a dhéanamh agus sin a mbeadh de
result.orig: thiocfadh léi gáire a dhéanamh agus sin a mbeadh de
result.html: thiocfadh léi gáire a dhéanamh agus sin a mbeadh deShe could have laughed and that would be it.
result.ponchtml: ṫiocfaḋ léi gáire a ḋéanaṁ agus sin a mbeaḋ deShe could have laughed and that would be it.

result.eng: They gave me as much education as they could afford.
result.ga: thug siad scoil agus léann domh ar feadh a n-acmhainne
result.orig: thug siad scoil agus léann domh ar feadh a n-acmhainne
result.html: thug siad scoil agus léann domh ar feadh a n-acmhainneThey gave me as much education as they could afford.
result.ponchtml: ṫug siad scoil agus léann doṁ ar feaḋ a n-acṁainneThey gave me as much education as they could afford.

result.eng: Nothing could scare me.
result.ga: ní raibh eagla le cur orm
result.orig: ní raibh eagla le cur orm
result.html: ní raibh eagla le cur ormNothing could scare me.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ eagla le cur ormNothing could scare me.

result.eng: He could not come home with empty pockets.
result.ga: ní thiocfadh leis a ghabháil chun an bhaile ar phócaí folmha
result.orig: ní thiocfadh leis a ghabháil chun an bhaile ar phócaí folmha
result.html: ní thiocfadh leis a ghabháil chun an bhaile ar phócaí folmhaHe could not come home with empty pockets.
result.ponchtml: ní ṫiocfaḋ leis a ġaḃáil ċun an ḃaile ar ṗócaí folṁaHe could not come home with empty pockets.

result.eng: She listened. Nothing more could be heard.
result.ga: d'éist sí ní raibh ní ba mhó le mothachtáil
result.orig: d'éist sí ní raibh ní ba mhó le mothachtáil
result.html: d'éist sí ní raibh ní ba mhó le mothachtáilShe listened. Nothing more could be heard.
result.ponchtml: d'éist sí ní raiḃ ní ba ṁó le moṫaċtáilShe listened. Nothing more could be heard.

result.eng: He felt sorry for them but there was nothing he could do for them.
result.ga: bhí truaigh aige dóibh ach truaigh gan tarrtháil a bhí inti
result.orig: bhí truaigh aige dóibh ach truaigh gan tarrtháil a bhí inti
result.html: bhí truaigh aige dóibh ach truaigh gan tarrtháil a bhí intiHe felt sorry for them but there was nothing he could do for them.
result.ponchtml: ḃí truaiġ aige dóiḃ aċ truaiġ gan tarrṫáil a ḃí intiHe felt sorry for them but there was nothing he could do for them.

result.eng: Nobody could recognize him.
result.ga: ní raibh dul ag aon duine a aithne
result.orig: ní raibh dul ag aon duine a aithne
result.html: ní raibh dul ag aon duine a aithneNobody could recognize him.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ dul ag aon duine a aiṫneNobody could recognize him.
